tool.name: aurora_statonlab_hmmscan
tool.description: Query protein sequences against Pfam database
tool.command:
######### each aurora tool generates a html file and have an files path directory associated with it. mkdir -p $report.files_path &&
######### three important paths: ######### 1. path to tool installation directory ######### 2. path to report html ######### 3. path to files_path directory associated with the report output. export TOOL_INSTALL_DIR='${__tool_directory__}' && export REPORT='$report' && export REPORT_FILES_PATH='$report.files_path' &&
############ create a hidden file to store r markdown rendering log touch $report.files_path/r_rendering.log.txt &&
############ finally run the render.R script Rscript '${__tool_directory__}/rmarkdown_report_render.R'
-o $report -d $report.files_path -g $significant_genes -u $protein_sequences_url
-E $evalue_threshold -T $score_threshold -e $domE -t $domT -b $best_hit -1 $pfam_tbl_out

param.name: significant_genes
param.label: Significant Genes
param.help: A significant genes file from the aurora_deseq2 tool.

param.name: protein_sequences_url
param.label: URL to a protein sequences file

param.name: evalue_threshold
param.label: Evalue threshold
param.help: report models <= this E-value threshold in output [10.0] (x>0)

param.name: score_threshold
param.label: Score threshold
param.help: report models >= this score threshold in output

param.name: domE
param.label: domains E-value threshold
param.help: report domains <= this E-value threshold in output [10.0] (x>0)

param.name: domT
param.label: domains score threshold
param.help: report domains >= this score cutoff in output

param.name: best_hit
param.label: Best Hit
param.help: Only return best hit for each query sequence
